name: flipdown
description: A lightweight and performant flip styled countdown clock

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && rm -rf example/css/flipdown && mkdir -p example/css/flipdown && rm -rf example/js/flipdown && mkdir -p example/js/flipdown
scripts.dist: npx babel src/flipdown.js -o dist/flipdown.js --no-comments && npx babel src/flipdown.js --presets=minify --no-comments -o dist/flipdown.min.js && cp src/flipdown.css dist/flipdown.css && uglifycss src/flipdown.css > dist/flipdown.min.css
scripts.example: npx babel src/flipdown.js -o example/js/flipdown/flipdown.js --no-comments && cp dist/flipdown.css example/css/flipdown/flipdown.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run dist && npm run example
